bug.author: delebash
bug.summary: [Violation] 'requestAnimationFrame' handler took <N>ms tfjs hand model demo
bug.description:
Please make sure that this is a bug. As per our GitHub Policy, we only address code/doc bugs, performance issues, feature requests and build/installation issues on GitHub. tag:bug_template
Windows 10 x64 Chrome Version 86.0.4240.111 (Official Build) (64-bit) tfjs version used in online demo at <denchmark-link:https://storage.googleapis.com/tfjs-models/demos/handpose/index.html>https://storage.googleapis.com/tfjs-models/demos/handpose/index.html</denchmark-link>
Describe the current behavior
In Chrome open https://storage.googleapis.com/tfjs-models/demos/handpose/index.html
Open DevTools
After the detection is running refresh the page
Error [Violation] 'requestAnimationFrame' handler took ms is thrown after refresh
Describe the expected behavior No error after refresh

comments.comment: I was not able to reproduce the same in MAC OS , may be this is specific to windows cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pyu10055>@pyu10055</denchmark-link>
ok, it does not seem to be interfering with performance. Thanks

Are you satisfied with the resolution of your issue? <denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=Yes&entry.2137816233=https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs/issues/4153>Yes</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=No&entry.2137816233=https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs/issues/4153>No</denchmark-link>
